original_text: And I will turn thee back, and put hooks into thy jaws, and I will bring thee forth, and all thine army, horses and horsemen, all of them clothed with all sorts of armour, even a great company with bucklers and shields, all of them handling swords:
korean_text: 너를 돌이켜 갈고리로 네 아가리를 꿰고 너와 말과 기마병 곧 네 온 군대를 끌어내되 완전한 갑옷을 입고 큰 방패와 작은 방패를 가지며 칼을 잡은 큰 무리와

sentences.original_text: And I will turn thee back
and put hooks into thy jaws
and I will bring thee forth
all of them clothed with all sorts of armour
even a great company with bucklers and shields
sentences.korean_translation: 작은 방패와 큰 방패를 가진 큰 무리까지도
